NO_ACTIONS: You can't do anything for the moment.

REMOVE_THING_KAKYOIN.BASE: You tried to remove the thing...
REMOVE_THING_KAKYOIN.FAILED: And you failed. Your only choice now is to bring kakyoin to the hospital.

BRING_KAKYOIN_HOSPITAL.SUCCESS: üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è **Male Nurse:** Kakyoin was taken back to the hospital and his costs were paid. He'll get back to you when he's better.
BRING_KAKYOIN_HOSPITAL.MONEY: üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è **Male Nurse:** It is the hospital that does not care about charity... WHERE'S YOUR MONEY ???

ANALYSE_HAIR.SUCCESS: üìß These hairs have been sent to the SPEEDWAGON FOUNDATION.
ANALYSE_HAIR.DESCRIPTION: Send the hairs to the Speedwagon Foundation.

GO_TO_AIRPORT.BASE: {{npc.taxi_driver}} Hello sir, it'll cost you **{{slowPrice}}** {{emojis.jocoins}}. The journey will take 2 hours. If you want, I can go four times faster for triple the price. What is your choice?
GO_TO_AIRPORT.MONEY: {{npc.taxi_driver}} You fool, you don't have enough money. You can't go anywhere.
GO_TO_AIRPORT.SLOW: {{npc.taxi_driver}} You're going to the airport. You'll be there in 2 hours. You can come back anytime you want. Thank you for your business.
GO_TO_AIRPORT.FAST: {{npc.taxi_driver}} Alright, I'll get you to the Morioh Airport in only **30 minutes**. GET READY!

TYGAD.SUCCESS: üìß You've successfully sent an e-mail about the current situation to your Grandfather. Now, wait for him to answer. Use the {{command.chapter}} to see how long it will take.
TYGAD.DESCRIPTION: Tell to your grandfather about Dio

DRIVE_AIRPLANE_TO_HONGKONG.DESCRIPTION: Drive the airplane immediately to Hong Kong
